turns.text: I would argue that the recipient is not relevant. You see, in my opinion, Charity in and of itself is a selfish act. Or perhaps, a better way to say it is that it is more of an exchange. We exchange our time, energy, money etc for a powerful thing. That thing is called purpose.

turns.text: Well, I have one in mind specifically. It's called Save The Children. They seem pretty fantastic. Theyve single handedly reduced the infant mortality rate by 62% in third world countries. Can I verify that? Of course not. But I believe it. And thats what matters to me. I believe that the little I have to give could help, and because of that it makes me feel delightful. I'm doing my best with what I've got. Are you?
